dimensions.label: Risk Taker
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take bold action and pursue opportunities with enthusiasm, often taking calculated risks.
Your FarTwin will approach challenges with a more reserved attitude, weighing options carefully before making a move.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will engage freely with others, enjoying social interactions and being approachable to strangers.
Your FarTwin will prefer quieter environments and may need time to warm up to new people or situations.

dimensions.label: Competitive Drive
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach competition?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive for excellence and push themselves to be the best, often setting high standards.
Your FarTwin will approach competition with a more laid-back attitude, focusing on enjoyment rather than victory at all costs.

dimensions.label: Adaptability
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin adapt to new situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be open to change and adjust quickly to new circumstances, often finding opportunities in unexpected places.
Your FarTwin may struggle with flexibility, preferring routine and stability over adapting to new situations or challenges.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will channel their creativity through various art forms or self-expression, often exploring new mediums and techniques.
Your FarTwin will focus on applying creative skills to real-world problems, prioritizing efficiency over artistic flair.

dimensions.label: Decision Making
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on objective analysis and evidence-based decision making, often avoiding emotional or impulsive choices.
Your FarTwin may trust their instincts and make decisions based on gut feelings, sometimes relying less on logic and reason.

dimensions.label: Emotional Intelligence
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be attuned to their own emotions and those of others, often recognizing and managing emotional triggers with ease.
Your FarTwin may struggle with self-awareness or empathy, potentially leading to misunderstandings or hurtful behavior.

dimensions.label: Problem Solving
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will break down complex problems into manageable parts, using data and evidence to drive solutions.
Your FarTwin may rely on instinct or creative thinking to find innovative solutions, sometimes bypassing traditional methods.
